Title: Amends the definition of automated external defibrillators
Summary: Amends the definition of automated external defibrillators to remove the requirement that an action be taken by an operator before delivering an appropriate electrical impulse to the patient's heart to perform defibrillation.
LawCode: Amd ยง3000-b, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to automated external defibrillators
